I actually think people overvalue um

if um if there is $1,000 in the pot and

you're going to have a

that's going to give your opponent just

right so if you never
Bluff then you're just not betting at
that pot enough if every time you had
the straight draw and the flush hits and
you just check and lose the pot so
you're you're what poker is all about is
a certain percentage of your bets in
that situation can be Bluffs
the bad Bluffs so you're going to have
to check sometimes you're going to miss
and check because you're certainly going
to not have the flush more often you
have the flush but if you know that
you're going to make a flush a certain
percent of the time you need to Bluff a
certain percentage of the time about

mean when I Bluff am I making a bad play
for positive expectation no I'm actually

a certain percentage of time I need to
Bluff a certain percentage of time and

maybe that wasn't the right time to

of good decisions there are certain you

I like to make where I know I'm making a
NE you know sort of a negative

if someone's making that same bet um

so if I put a th000 in the pot I'm

if you told me you know they're only

because I don't want to give people the

and I feel like I get benefit if they

or maybe someone checks to me where they

do apply to business

using you have you know the strength of
